languages.text: "Передай, что мне больше не нужны законники ни в каком виде. И чтобы маршал не беспокоил меня, или я вас всех вышвырну с Даргонуса — свободен".
"Tell him that, as of this moment, I want nothing to do with any lawmen. You and your Marshal are never to disturb me again, or I will have you all removed from Dargonus. Dismissed."
languages.original_text: "Передай, что мне больше не нужны законники ни в каком виде. И чтобы маршал не беспокоил меня, или я вас всех вышвырну с Даргонуса — свободен".

traits.locale_text: "Tell him that, as of this moment, I want nothing to do with any lawmen. You and your Marshal are never to disturb me again, or I will have you all removed from Dargonus. Dismissed."
"Tell him that, as of this moment, I want nothing to do with any lawmen. You and your Marshal are never to disturb me again, or I will have you all removed from Dargonus. Dismissed."
"Tell him that, as of this moment, I want nothing to do with any lawmen. You and your Marshal are never to disturb me again, or I will have you all removed from Dargonus. Dismissed."

"Tell him that, as of this moment, I want nothing to do with any lawmen. You and your Marshal are never to disturb me again, or I will have you all removed from Dargonus. Dismissed."

languages.text: 「彼に伝えろ。今この瞬間から、法執行官どもとは一切関わるつもりはない。君も君の将帥も、二度と{mf|俺|私}を煩わせるな。さもなくば、全員ダルゴナスから追い出す。以上だ」
languages.original_text: "Tell him that, as of this moment, I want nothing to do with any lawmen. You and your Marshal are never to disturb me again, or I will have you all removed from Dargonus. Dismissed."

traits.locale_text: 「彼に伝えろ。今この瞬間から、法執行官どもとは一切関わるつもりはない。君も君の将帥も、二度と{mf|俺|私}を煩わせるな。さもなくば、全員ダルゴナスから追い出す。以上だ」

languages.text: "Sagt ihm, dass ich von nun an nichts mehr mit irgendwelchen Gesetzeshütern zu tun haben will. Ihr und der Marschall stört mich besser nie wieder, sonst lasse ich Euch alle von Dargonus entfernen. Wegtreten!"
languages.original_text: "Tell him that, as of this moment, I want nothing to do with any lawmen. You and your Marshal are never to disturb me again, or I will have you all removed from Dargonus. Dismissed."

traits.locale_text: "Sagt ihm, dass ich von nun an nichts mehr mit irgendwelchen Gesetzeshütern zu tun haben will. Ihr und der Marschall stört mich besser nie wieder, sonst lasse ich Euch alle von Dargonus entfernen. Wegtreten!"

languages.text: « Dites-lui qu'actuellement, je ne souhaite pas entretenir de lien avec des hommes de loi. Je ne souhaite plus jamais être {mf|dérangé|dérangée} par vous ou le maréchal, sous peine de tous vous renvoyer de Dargonus. Vous pouvez disposer. »
languages.original_text: "Tell him that, as of this moment, I want nothing to do with any lawmen. You and your Marshal are never to disturb me again, or I will have you all removed from Dargonus. Dismissed."

traits.locale_text: « Dites-lui qu'actuellement, je ne souhaite pas entretenir de lien avec des hommes de loi. Je ne souhaite plus jamais être {mf|dérangé|dérangée} par vous ou le maréchal, sous peine de tous vous renvoyer de Dargonus. Vous pouvez disposer. »

languages.text: «Dígale que en estos momentos no deseo tener que lidiar con agentes de la ley. Les prohíbo a usted y su mariscal que vuelvan a molestarme, de lo contrario haré que los expulsen de Dargonus. Retírese».
languages.original_text: "Tell him that, as of this moment, I want nothing to do with any lawmen. You and your Marshal are never to disturb me again, or I will have you all removed from Dargonus. Dismissed."

traits.locale_text: «Dígale que en estos momentos no deseo tener que lidiar con agentes de la ley. Les prohíbo a usted y su mariscal que vuelvan a molestarme, de lo contrario haré que los expulsen de Dargonus. Retírese».

languages.text: “那你就告诉他，从现在开始，我不想和法务部的人有任何瓜葛。你和你的元帅不准再来打扰我，否则我就把你们统统赶出达戈努斯。你可以走了。”
languages.original_text: "Tell him that, as of this moment, I want nothing to do with any lawmen. You and your Marshal are never to disturb me again, or I will have you all removed from Dargonus. Dismissed."

traits.locale_text: “那你就告诉他，从现在开始，我不想和法务部的人有任何瓜葛。你和你的元帅不准再来打扰我，否则我就把你们统统赶出达戈努斯。你可以走了。”

languages.text: "Ona de ki şu andan itibaren hiçbir kanun adamıyla işim olmaz. Sen ve Miralay'ın beni bir daha asla rahatsız etmeyeceksiniz... Yoksa hepinizi Dargonus'tan silerim. Çekilebilirsin."
languages.original_text: "Tell him that, as of this moment, I want nothing to do with any lawmen. You and your Marshal are never to disturb me again, or I will have you all removed from Dargonus. Dismissed."

traits.locale_text: "Ona de ki şu andan itibaren hiçbir kanun adamıyla işim olmaz. Sen ve Miralay'ın beni bir daha asla rahatsız etmeyeceksiniz, yoksa hepinizi Dargonus'tan silerim. Çekilebilirsin."
